headline: CES 2025: Schlage Unveils its First Ultra Wideband Solution, the Schlage Sense Pro™ Smart Deadbolt - and Introduces the Schlage Arrive™ Smart WiFi Deadbolt
summary: Schlage, a trusted leader in home security and access solutions for over a century, today announced its latest breakthroughs in smart lock technology at the 2025 Consumer Electronics Show (CES): the Schlage Sense Pro™ Smart Deadbolt and the Schlage Arrive™ Smart WiFi Deadbolt.
